term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - main-chain polymer liquid crystal
term.title: main-chain polymer liquid crystal

item.text: A polymer, whose molecules have mesogenic units only in their main chains.

sources.item: PAC, 2002, 74, 493. 'Definitions of basic terms relating to polymer liquid crystals (IUPAC Recommendations 2001)' on page 503 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200274030493)
